ROW.DATDSC: select cy123||'.'||cy123mc hymc, sum(taxmny) taxmny, '' bl, sum(gdp) gdp from ( select cy123,cy123mc,yymm, nvl(sum(taxmny),0)/10000 taxmny, sum(case substr(yymm,-2) when '03' then gdp when '06' then gdp when '09' then gdp when '12' then gdp else 0 end) gdp from tax_fx_chart001 where yymm>= '[%YM1]' and yymm<= '[%YM2]' group by cy123,cy123mc,yymm order by yymm,cy123 ) group by cy123,cy123mc order by cy123,cy123mc

select yymm,sum(taxmny_1) taxmny_1, sum(taxmny_2) taxmny_2, sum(taxmny_3) taxmny_3, sum(gdp_1) gdp_1, sum(gdp_2) gdp_2, sum(gdp_3) gdp_3 from ( select cy123,replace(yymm,'-','') yymm, round(sum(decode(cy123,'1',taxmny,0))/10000,2) taxmny_1, round(sum(decode(cy123,'2',taxmny,0))/10000,2) taxmny_2, round(sum(decode(cy123,'3',taxmny,0))/10000,2) taxmny_3, round(max(decode(cy123,'1',gdp,0))/100,2) gdp_1, round(max(decode(cy123,'2',gdp,0))/100,2) gdp_2, round(max(decode(cy123,'3',gdp,0))/100,2) gdp_3 from tax_fx_chart001 where yymm>= '[%YM1]' and yymm<= '[%YM2]' group by cy123,yymm order by yymm ) group by yymm order by yymm

select hy.cy123,hy.cy123mc,yymm,nvl(sum(taxmny),0) taxmny,0 gdp from tax_taxdata tax,dj_nsrxx dj,tax_dm_gy_hy hy where tax.djxh=dj.djxh and dj.hy_dm=hy.hy_dm and tax.yymm>= '[%YM1]' and tax.yymm<= '[%YM2]' group by hy.cy123,hy.cy123mc,yymm
